sentences.sContent: Include orders not to stand on top of thetoilet seat and defaecate, then use water bottles to slosh on oneself.
sentences.sContent_eng: Include orders not to stand on top of thetoilet seat and defaecate, then use water bottles to slosh on oneself.
sentences.sCn: 以及要求人们不要站在马桶座圈上排便，也不要用水瓶把水溅在自己身上。

words.tran: 搅动；痛饮；艰难行进；发出溅水声（slosh的过去分词）
